revised_title: Fungal Biosynthesis: A Review of Mould Metabolites and Lichen Acids
tldr: This article discusses the biosynthesis of various compounds produced by fungi, particularly moulds, and lichens. The author explores the chemical structures and properties of these compounds, including their breakdown products and their relationships to other molecules. The article highlights the importance of understanding fungal biosynthesis for various applications, such as the production of antibiotics and other useful chemicals.
